m_szDocTitle: Business Digest: Austin gasoline prices rise 3 cents this week | www.mystatesman.com
m_szDocSumamry: Business Digest: Austin gasoline prices rise 3 cents this week Posted: 3:18 p.m. Thursday, June 9, 2016 FUEL Austin gasoline prices rise 3 cents this week Austin-area gasoline prices continued their recent climb, rising 3 cents this week, according to auto club AAA Texas. The average local price for a gallon of regular unleaded gasoline is $2.12, AAA Texas said. Since dropping to $1.50 per gallon during the week of Feb. 25, local prices have risen an average of 62 cents per gallon. The current average of $2.12 per gallon is 38 cents lower than the same week last year, when the average price wa
